message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $140. I believe it offers excellent value at this price, considering its features and benefits.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to pay up to $130 for the product. Looking forward to your response.
Bob, I understand your position, but $130 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $135?
Thanks for your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I think $130 is a fair price. I'd like to stick with my original offer.
